events.name: Global Crash
events.description: Panic on world stock exchanges. Investors are selling off assets en masse.

events.name: Century Bull Market
events.description: Record gains across all markets. Consumer optimism is sky-high.

events.name: Crypto Moon
events.description: Mass adoption of Bitcoin by major central banks.

events.name: Chip War
events.description: Embargo on semiconductor exports paralyzes electronics production.

events.name: Tesla Breakthrough
events.description: Elon Musk presents a battery with a 2000 km range. Stocks soar.

events.name: OPEC Cuts Production
events.description: The cartel drastically limits oil supply. Energy prices surge.

events.name: AI Bubble Burst
events.description: Investors realize that AI is not yet generating real profits.

events.name: Vision Pro 2 Success
events.description: Apple dominates the AR/VR market. New goggles are a massive hit.

events.name: NATO Rearmament
events.description: Defense spending in Europe exceeds all forecasts.

events.name: NVDA: New Processor
events.description: New GPU architecture is 100x faster than the competition.

events.name: Banking Crisis
events.description: The collapse of a major regional bank triggers a domino effect.

events.name: Rates Hiked
events.description: The FED aggressively raises interest rates to curb inflation.

events.name: Medical Breakthrough
events.description: Promising results in research for a universal cancer cure.

events.name: Azure Outage
events.description: Global disruption in Microsoft's cloud services.

events.name: Shopping Spree
events.description: Record retail sales during the holiday season.

events.name: Copper Surge
events.description: Global copper deficit benefits the mining giant.

events.name: Factory Strikes
events.description: Labor unions block production at key manufacturing plants.

events.name: Amazon Automation
events.description: Introduction of humanoid robots cuts logistics costs.

events.name: Tax Increase
events.description: Governments introduce a global 25% corporate tax.

events.name: Mining Ban
events.description: More countries ban crypto mining for environmental reasons.

events.name: Google Antitrust Case
events.description: Department of Justice demands the breakup of Alphabet Inc.

events.name: New Virus
events.description: Fears of returning restrictions hit market sentiment.

events.name: Peace Treaty
events.description: Geopolitical tensions drop sharply. Defense sector loses ground.

events.name: Orlen: SMR Nuclear
events.description: Successful certification of small modular reactors in Poland.

events.name: Green Revolution
events.description: Massive subsidies for renewables hit the traditional energy sector.

events.name: Metaverse is Alive
events.description: Active users on Horizon Worlds exceed 100 million.

events.name: Inflation Defeated
events.description: Prices stabilize much faster than analysts predicted.

events.name: Quantum Computer
events.description: First commercial application of quantum computing in logistics.

events.name: Boeing Disaster
events.description: Another technical failure grounds the 737 MAX fleet.

events.name: Retail Boycott
events.description: Consumers protest against high margins of retail giants.

events.name: Netflix Success
events.description: Crackdown on password sharing brings millions of new subscribers.

events.name: Digital Dollar
events.description: USA announces a pilot program for CBDC.

events.name: Witcher 4 Success
events.description: Game breaks pre-order records. CD Projekt is back on top.

events.name: Factories of the Future
events.description: New AI robots replace 30% of personnel in auto plants.

events.name: IBM Watson Return
events.description: IBM signs a massive government contract for AI data analysis.

events.name: World War III
events.description: The worst-case scenario becomes reality. Total market panic.

events.name: Gene Editing
events.description: First successful CRISPR therapy approved by the FDA.

events.name: Coca-Cola Failure
events.description: New recipe for the flagship drink is rejected by the market.

events.name: Global Cyberattack
events.description: Hackers paralyze payment systems in 20 countries.

events.name: Shell Oil Spill
events.description: Ecological disaster off the coast of Africa hits Shell's valuation.

events.name: Mars Colony
events.description: Humanity's first permanent outpost on another planet.

events.name: Nuclear Fusion
events.description: Free and clean energy becomes a reality. End of fossil fuels.

events.name: J.P. Morgan Scandal
events.description: Huge loss on derivatives hits the bank's reputation.

events.name: Crypto Spring
events.description: The crypto market wakes up after a long bear market.

events.name: Intel Foundry Success
events.description: Intel successfully begins manufacturing processors for competitors.

events.name: Drone Era
events.description: New war doctrine based on drone swarms drives spending.

events.name: Hydrogen BMW
events.description: The first mass-produced hydrogen engine car hits showrooms.

events.name: New Retail Leader
events.description: Competition from Asia aggressively takes market share from Amazon.

events.name: Vale Mining Disaster
events.description: Dam breach at a mine in Brazil hits mining stocks.

events.name: Signal from Space
events.description: Scientists confirm receipt of a signal from an alien civilization.
